abstract: The user-visible label associated with the app profile.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this property to store the user-readable name for the user profile. When prompting the user to select a preferred profile, the [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVUserManager] displays the names from your [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVAppProfileDescriptor] objects in the selection dialog.

You must specify a nonempty string in this property.

# name

**Instance Property**

The user-visible label associated with the app profile.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to store the user-readable name for the user profile. When prompting the user to select a preferred profile, the [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVUserManager] displays the names from your [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVAppProfileDescriptor] objects in the selection dialog.

You must specify a nonempty string in this property.
title: name
